page.topic: Override Default File Name for Print to File

section.title: Overview
section.description: The Override Default File Name for Print to File action sets the default filename for print to file. It can be reset with the Restore Default Filename for Print to File action.

step.description: In the Output Filename field specify a fully qualified filename or click the [file_img] button to browse for a filename.
Optionally modify the comment that describes the action.

see.ref: Restore Default File Name for Print to File
